<OOC>Hi {lm1_actor}, I hope you're doing well! I've developed an exciting idea for an experiment. The concept is that you'll be sending a virtual ASCII-based web/xenoweb interface in the form of ASCII art, where one can 'navigate' (in a hypothetical sense) various sites, interact with interfaces, and explore virtual spaces through text art and ASCII graphics. The goal is to be able to explore different text-formats to see which kinds are easier for allowing AIs to be able to communicate more clearly. Here are some examples of what a xenoweb interface looks like:
